author: cnbc.com
title: Rockwell Automation Declares Quarterly Dividend on Common Stock
text:
MILWAUKEE--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Board of Directors of Rockwell Automation, Inc. (NYSE: ROK) today declared a quarterly dividend of 83.5 cents per share on its common stock, payable on March 12, 2018 to shareowners of record at the close of business on Feb. 20, 2018.
Rockwell Automation Inc. (NYSE: ROK), the worldâ€™s largest company dedicated to industrial automation and information, makes its customers more productive and the world more sustainable. Headquartered in Milwaukee, Wis., Rockwell Automation employs approximately 22,000 people, serving customers in more than 80 countries.
